FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='main',
      quals=[],

            TypeDecl(
              declname='main',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='classe',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=

                TypeDecl(

                    IdentifierType(
                      names=['t_etudiant'],
                    )
                )

                Constant(

                  value='40',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Decl(
          name='nb_etudiants',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='nb_etudiants',
              quals=[],

                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Combien d\'etudiants? "',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[3]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='scanf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"%d"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                UnaryOp(
                  op='&',
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='nb_etudiants',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[4]=
        DoWhile(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='!=',
              left=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='getchar',
                    )
                )
              right=
                Constant(
                  type='char',
                  value="'\\n'",
                )
            )
          stmt=
            Compound(
            )
        )
      block_items[5]=
        For(
          init=
            DeclList(
              decls[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='i',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='i',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                  init=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='0',
                    )
                )
            )
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='<',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='i',
                )
              right=
                ID(
                  name='nb_etudiants',
                )
            )
          next=
            UnaryOp(
              op='p++',
              expr=
                ID(
                  name='i',
                )
            )
          stmt=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='etudiant_saisir',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        UnaryOp(
                          op='&',
                          expr=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='classe',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                ID(
                                  name='i',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[6]=
        For(
          init=
            DeclList(
              decls[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='i',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='i',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )

                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='0',
                    )
                )

          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='<',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='i',
                )

                )

              op='p++',

                  name='i',
                )
            )
          stmt=

                    )

                                )
                              subscript=
                                ID(
                                  name='i',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[7]=

          name=
            ID(
              name='system',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(

                  type='string',
                  value='"pause"',
                )
            )
        )

FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='etudiant_afficher',
      quals=[],

  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"**** FICHE DE L\'ETUDIANT-E ****\\n"',
                )

        )
      block_items[1]=
        FuncCall(
          name=

              name='printf',
            )

              exprs[0]=

                  type='string',
                  value='"Nom: %s\\n"',
                )

                  type='->',
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='et',
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='nom',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Prenom: %s\\n"',
                )

                StructRef(
                  type='->',
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='et',
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='prenom',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[3]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Code permanent: %s\\n"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                StructRef(
                  type='->',
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='et',
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='code_perm',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[4]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"TP1: %lf\\n"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                StructRef(
                  type='->',
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='et',
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='tp1',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[5]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"TP2: %lf\\n"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                StructRef(
                  type='.',
                  name=
                    UnaryOp(
                      op='*',
                      expr=
                        ID(
                          name='et',
                        )
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='tp2',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[6]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Intra: %lf\\n"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                StructRef(
                  type='.',
                  name=
                    UnaryOp(
                      op='*',
                      expr=
                        ID(
                          name='et',
                        )
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='intra',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[7]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Final: %lf\\n"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                StructRef(
                  type='.',

                      op='*',
                      expr=
                        ID(

                    ID(
                      name='finale',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    )
)
